name: Astroball (Rest Home Games)
description:
Astroball is an adventure platformer about a spaceman who crashes his ship in a distant alien world and must traverse the landscape to find his missing ship parts.

Astroball is a 3D adventure platformer inspired by games such as Mario 64. It was created over 14 weeks by a team of friends as a summer project.

Controls

Controller

  • Left Analog stick to move
  • Right Analog stick to move Camera
  • A button to Jump
  • X button to interact
  • Left Trigger to Brake

PC Controls

  • W, A, S, D – Move
  • Spacebar – Jump
  • Shift – Brake
  • Mouse to move camera
